sense.def:
One's spirit
je tisti del človeka, ki ni telesen, pač pa je povezan z njegovimi najglobljimi mislimi in čustvi.

seg.quote: Fulfilment must be sought through the spirit, not the body or the mind.

sense.def:
The spirit of a dead person
je netelesni del umrle osebe, za katerega nekateri ljudje verjamejo, da ostane živ tudi po telesni smrti.

A spirit
je tudi nadnaravno bitje.

seg.quote: The charm is worn to ward off evil spirits.

sense.def:
Spirit
je navdušenje, energija in samozavest.

seg.quote: ...a performance full of spirit and originality.

sense.def:
Izraz
spirit
lahko uporabimo tudi za določeno stališče.

seg.quote: He made the proposal in a spirit of rebellion.

sense.def:
One's spirits
je človekovo dobro ali slabo počutje. Na primer,
one's spirits are high
pomeni, da je človek vesel in srečen.

seg.quote: The children lifted my spirits with their laughter.

sense.def:
The spirit of a law or an agreement
je način, kako naj bi razumeli ali uporabljali neki zakon ali dogovor.

seg.quote: I think we'd be breaking the spirit of the agreement if we went ahead.

sense.def:
Spirits
so močne alkoholne pijače, na primer viski ali gin.

To spirit someone out of or into a place
pomeni poskrbeti, da nekdo na skrivaj hitro odide nekam ali od nekod.

seg.quote: Somehow the Action Service had spirited him across the frontier.
